fields.name: Debugger
fields.description: He only tells you how fast you are.
fields.long_description: * based on the fastest pace recorded for the track / car combo

fields.name: Track Guide
fields.long_description:
Tells you how to approach turns and other info.

Works currently only for those combos: 

* iRacing / Mazda MX-5 Cup / okayama short

fields.name: Braker
fields.description: will tell you when to brake
fields.long_description:
Before the brakepoint he'll say something like `30 percent`, which means to apply 30 percent brake pressure at the brakepoint.

Right at the brakepoint, he'll just say `brake`.

For turns where you justs `lift` the throttle, you'll hear how much you have to lift.

fields.name: Commentator
fields.description: will comment on before the session
fields.long_description: He'll tell you about your car before the session starts.
